entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning in the morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
